blogPost.title: What are good careers where I can make an impact and also a decent living? Answer by @McCambridgeMatt, Co-Founder & CEO @EdenHealthInc, Forbes 30 Under 30. https://t.co/yTfPuk949u https://t.co/1YURVV1wYn
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 影響を与えつつ、きちんとした生活を送ることができる良いキャリアとは？Answer by @McCambridgeMatt, Co-Founder & CEO @EdenHealthInc, Forbes 30 Under 30. https://t.co/yTfPuk949u https://t.co/1YURVV1wYn
有什么好的职业可以让我产生影响，同时也能获得体面的生活？回答者：@McCambridgeMatt，联合创始人& CEO @EdenHealthInc，福布斯30岁以下人士。https://t.co/yTfPuk949u https://t.co/1YURVV1wYn
有什麼好的職業可以讓我產生影響，同時也能獲得體面的生活？回答者：@McCambridgeMatt，聯合創始人& CEO @EdenHealthInc，福布斯30歲以下人士。https://t.co/yTfPuk949u https://t.co/1YURVV1wYn

previous.title: How can diversity in leadership change the way we work? Answer by @dojiboy9, Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/jl3NzkrE6u

localize.full_text: リーダーシップの多様性が働き方を変えるには？回答者：@dojiboy9, Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/jl3NzkrE6u
领导层的多样性如何能改变我们的工作方式？回答者：@dojiboy9，联合创始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/jl3NzkrE6u
領導層的多樣性如何能改變我們的工作方式？回答者：@dojiboy9，聯合創始人& CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/jl3NzkrE6u

next.title: How can parents better educate their kids about opioids? Answer by Ben Westhoff, Author of Fentanyl, Inc. https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI

localize.full_text: 親が子供にオピオイドについて上手に教育するには？回答：Ben Westhoff, Author of Fentanyl, Inc. https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI
父母如何更好地对孩子进行阿片类药物的教育？由《芬太尼公司》作者Ben Westhoff回答 https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI
父母如何更好地對孩子進行阿片類藥物的教育？由《芬太尼公司》作者Ben Westhoff回答 https://t.co/iw5NUIJtHM https://t.co/yOOjJu4vVI
